text: Chris Ajemian (born November 29, 1986 in Duxbury, Massachusetts) ia a professional lacrosse player with the Boston Cannons of Major League Lacrosse. ==Professional career== Ajemian was drafted in the 7th round (39th overall selection) of the 2009 Major League Lacrosse Supplemental Draft by Boston Cannons. ==Collegiate career== Ajemian attended Fairfield University, where he served as captain of the Fairfield Stags men's lacrosse team during his senior season. He was an All-NEILA selection and named to the USILA North/South All- Star game in 2009. ==High school career== Ajemian attended Duxbury High School, where he was named a high school All-American in 2005 and helped the Dragons to the 2004 and 2005 state championship. ==External links== *Boston Cannons Profile ==References== Category:Major League Lacrosse players Category:Living people Category:1986 births Category:Fairfield Stags men's lacrosse players Category:Lacrosse players from Massachusetts Category:People from Duxbury, Massachusetts Category:Boston Cannons players
title: Chris Ajemian
